title: Python Automated Video Brander
description: Python application that automates branding post-processing for educational video content at UBC Sauder. Integrates with the Panopto video platform and Google forms to allow faculty to submit a branding request with custom specifications, at which point the app will grab the video, apply branding to their specifications and reupload to Panopto.

title: Yuki Postal Service (YPS)
description: YPS is a retro “album tracking service” created for New Zealand based musician Yuki, to generate excitement around an upcoming album. It was designed to resemble the postal tracking services of the mid-2000s and provide “shipping updates” to tease the album. Clicking on the update timestamps will play samples.

title: UBC Learning Analytics Hackathon
description: I was an organizer for the 2020 UBC Learning Analytics Hackathon. I helped write a lot of the starter code and instructional materials. Our physical event was cancelled due to COVID-19 but in October we ran it virtually! On the day I helped answer programming questions (especially helping new react/JS developers).

title: Canvas Module Progress Dashboard
description: The Canvas Module Progress Dashboard is a Python script and interactive dashboard made for UBC faculty. It's designed to provide instructors with a overview of student progress in their course on Canvas. The script collects and formats data from the Canvas LMS API. The data can then be hooked up to a collection of interactive dashboards we designed in Tableau.
